targets.query: SELECT last("temperature") FROM "yvr" WHERE time > now() - 30m
SELECT last("temperature") FROM "yvr" WHERE time > now() - 30m
SELECT max("windGust_kph") FROM "record" WHERE time > now() - 10m GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'temp_air' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'humi_air' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT max("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'temp_air' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'temp_air' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE ("instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_dir_avg') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT max("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_dir_max' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT median("value") FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_dir_avg' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT mean("value") AS "value" FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_speed_avg' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), type_instance
SELECT min("value") AS "value" FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_speed_min' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), type_instance
SELECT max("value") AS "value" FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_speed_max' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), type_instance
SELECT median("value") AS "value" FROM "wxt_value" WHERE "instance" = '46.234.46.52-4001' AND "type_instance" = 'wind_speed_avg' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h), type_instance
